annonstext:
Fresenius Kabi is a global health care company that specializes in lifesaving medicines and medical technologies for infusion, transfusion and clinical nutrition. Our expansive portfolio of products and global network of science and manufacturing centers provide essential support for the care of critical and chronically ill patients. We are part of Fresenius SE, a health care group with more than 100 years of experience in pharmaceuticals, medical devices and life sciences. Our employees – more than 35,000 worldwide – develop and deliver injectable pharmaceuticals and infusion systems; blood collection, transfusion and cell technologies; and essential nutrients for parenteral nutrition.

Whether you work for us, buy from us, partner with us, or invest in us, you will come to know that caring is at the core of everything we do. Our purpose is to put lifesaving medicines and technologies in the hands of people who care for patients, and to find answers to the challenges they face every day.

The Product Manager Intravenous Drugs is essential for driving the strategy and tactics for the existing product portfolio of IV Generic Drugs within the Anaesthetics, Anti-Infectives, Critical-Care and Oncology area.

You will focus on designing, developing and implementing marketing strategies and plans to support the organization’s products and to meet the organization’s objectives. In addition, you will manage the portfolios in a way that optimizes positioning of the products across various customer groups and doing so by working closely with the sales team to ensure excellent execution in the field. The Product Managers is also responsible for the financial forecast and to give input to the supply forecasts.

As part of the Marketing team you will be the primary speaking partner for all colleagues in the sub-region and regional head office in Paris regarding any IV Generic related topics. You will report to the Marketing Manager Pharma and be part of a high performing team of experienced Product Managers based in Uppsala.

Main Accountabilities

Lead development and implementation of the annual marketing plan to meet business expectations
Have ownership of the various channels of communication and promotion
Ensure all marketing and training related material is up-to-date and in accordance with local rules and regulations
Develop communication tools and marketing material that meets the needs and requirements of our various customer groups and the local market
Stay on top of knowledge on clinical practices and developments in the market and among customers
Prepare and present yearly sales budget and mid-year budget forecast
Outline medium-term-strategy with focus on portfolio development and life cycle management
Monitor monthly sales and profitability development for the assigned portfolios
Provide supply chain with sales prognoses and forecast
Participate in Fresenius Kabi activities such as local or international congresses and Marketing meetings
The Right Person

Education on University degree level or equivalent in relevant disciplines, e.g. in Marketing, Medicine, Science, Pharmaceuticals, Nursing, or Business Administration
Minimum 3 years of product management/product marketing experience in the healthcare area
Knowledge of the Swedish healthcare system, and familiar with stakeholders, the tender business and patient pathways
Experience of forecasting and product demand planning
”LIF-auktorisation” or equivalent education for ”läkemedelsinformatör”
Sales experience from the healthcare industry is beneficial
Strong communication skills in Swedish and English; at ease presenting to large audiences
Valid driver’s license for vehicles class B (B-körkort)
 

The Role

The position is initially a temporary employment with a view to become permanent employment if both parts agree after 6 months.

About Us

We are a growing company with about 1100 employees in Sweden. You would join the Marketing Unit located within the city centre of Uppsala, with its closeness to the Uppsala Global Network Plant.

Being part of Fresenius Kabi means being a part of an environment with a strong prospect. We believe in our employees and we are passionate about the development of every individual. Our global extent gives you a great opportunity to select your own future development path.

Contact

If you want to know more, please contact Marketing Manager Pharma FIRSTNAME LASTNAME  TELEPHONENO .

Union representatives are Frank Glackin for Unionen,  TELEPHONENO and FIRSTNAME LASTNAME for SACO  TELEPHONENO We look forward to your application!

Selection and interviews will be ongoing during the whole application period, so please register your application in English as soon as possible.

We do not accept applications by e-mail or post.
